verbs.description: Michael Cohen [V: has] long represented President Trump . But their interests have increasingly diverged amid an FBI criminal investigation into Cohen .
[ARG0: Michael Cohen] has [ARGM-TMP: long] [V: represented] [ARG1: President Trump] . But their interests have increasingly diverged amid an FBI criminal investigation into Cohen .
Michael Cohen has long represented President Trump . But their interests [V: have] increasingly diverged amid an FBI criminal investigation into Cohen .
